title: Corvettes
summary: Corvettes are the smallest and cheapest warships, which have a very different control system to starfighters and a turret modification system. While slower than starfighters, these ships have the capability to deal and take much more damage. They are seen as a requirement for mid-game PvE. They have lower health compared to larger warships, but remain viable in PvP due to their relatively high speed and agility.
full_text:
Corvettes are the smallest and cheapest warships, which have a very different control system to starfighters and a turret modification system. While slower than starfighters, these ships have the capability to deal and take much more damage. They are seen as a requirement for mid-game PvE. They have lower health compared to larger warships, but remain viable in PvP due to their relatively high speed and agility. 
The Edict, Liberty, and Knifejaw corvettes require blueprints which can be purchased from Kavani, Lycentian, and Foralkan offices respectively.

content_structure.title: Corvettes
content_structure.content:
Corvettes are the smallest and cheapest warships, which have a very different control system to starfighters and a turret modification system. While slower than starfighters, these ships have the capability to deal and take much more damage. They are seen as a requirement for mid-game PvE. They have lower health compared to larger warships, but remain viable in PvP due to their relatively high speed and agility. 
The Edict, Liberty, and Knifejaw corvettes require blueprints which can be purchased from Kavani, Lycentian, and Foralkan offices respectively.
